subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Greg Maddux, Tom Glavine and Frank Thomas, stars with no connection to performance-enhancing drugs, were elected to the Baseball Hall of Fame on their first try, one year after writers chose no one for Cooperstown.
snippet: Greg Maddux, Tom Glavine and Frank Thomas, stars with no connection to performance-enhancing drugs, were elected to the Baseball Hall of Fame on their first try, one year after writers chose no one for Cooperstown.
